title: TVSeason
description: Season dedicated to TV broadcast and associated online delivery.

allOf.description: The most generic kind of creative work, including books, movies, photographs, software programs, etc.
A media season e.g. tv, radio, video game etc.

countryOfOrigin.description: The country of the principal offices of the production company or individual responsible for the movie or program.

partOfTVSeries.description: The TV series to which this episode or season belongs.
